meanings.sent1: The fireproof safe was made of incombustible materials.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter wore incombustible gear to protect himself from the flames.
meanings.sent3: The incombustible blanket refused to catch fire no matter how hard the arsonist tried.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was like an incombustible flame, never fading or extinguishing.
meanings.sent5: The incombustible fortress stood strong against the fiery dragon's breath.

meanings.sent1: The incombustible fabric of his jacket saved him from the burning building.
meanings.sent2: The incombustible wood used in the construction of the house prevented a major fire.
meanings.sent3: The incombustible candle refused to melt even under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an incombustible spark, igniting passion in all who knew her.
meanings.sent5: The incombustible spirit of the team kept them going despite the challenges they faced.
